alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:08PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1207 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Diamondhead, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 14 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Bay Saint Louis, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
